LanguageData.SyrThrumkin_useUnsupportedHairTooltip: Allows thrumkin to spawn with any style of hair instead of just with their own hair styles.
LanguageData.SyrThrumkin_useStandardAITooltip: Advanced food AI will make Thrumkin correctly prioritize food based on how much nutrition it has for them.
LanguageData.SyrThrumkin_manualWoodConsumptionTooltip: Thrumkin will not automatically eat wood when urgently hungry, instead you have to order them to eat it
LanguageData.ThrumkinThrumboTameSuccess: {0} successfully tamed {1} with the help of their natural similarity.
LanguageData.ThrumkinThrumboTameNameSuccess: {0} successfully tamed {1} with the help of their natural similarity and named [PAWN_objective] {2}.
